description: In going where you have to go, and doing what you have to do, and seeing what you have to see, you'll dull and blunt the instrument you write with.
A determined soul will do more with a rusty monkey wrench than a loafer will accomplish with all the tools in a machine shop
Use a screwdriver instead of a hammer.when life gives you lemons.Using words to describe magic is like using a screwdriver to cut roast beef
I think we're all born with this huge canvas in front of us and the paintbrushes and the paint, and we choose what to put on this canvas.
A joke is just a paintbrush.Your body is not your art - it's your paintbrush.I cannot remember a time when I was not interested in both gardening and painting
With the world so set on tearing itself apart, it donâ€™t seem like such a bad thing to me to wanna put a little bit of it back together.
